alert.note: Alert for Garfield; McCone; Roosevelt; Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 11:42PM MDT until July 31 at 12:45AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Garfield County in northeastern Montana... Western Roosevelt County in northeastern Montana... Southeastern Valley County in northeastern Montana... Northwestern McCone County in northeastern Montana... * Until 1245 AM MDT. * At 1142 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles northwest of Lustre to near Nashua to 7 miles north of The Pines Rec Area, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Wolf Point, Nashua, Fort Peck, The Pines Rec Area, Duck Creek Rec Area, Lustre, Fort Peck Marina, Bredette, Frazer, Nelson Creek Rec Area, Rock Creek Rec Area, Oswego, Park Grove, Volt, Haxby and Whatley. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
